column5: Out in the boat with my brother and son today. Topwater bass was the plan but the bass missed the memo.  Ryan was the first one with a fish in the boat...    His biggest yet, although he was accused of cheating because he switched to a crankbait.    "Black" bass for my brother   I found some pike as well     We even got some pike back in the slop with the rubber frogs..  My first though was I had a really solid bass, then i figured it might be a bowfin but once we got it out of the weeds it was another pike.    In the end we caught a few more bass than pike but considering we hadn't caught/seen any pike in these spots for 6 weeks it was a bit of a surprise.
Great report Rob,any time on the water is good.You three did good !!!!!!!!!!!
nice day - i bet bringing this one in brought some woo hoos! Nice fish
Rick, nice you copied and posted that pic.  Hey dad, shouldnt you be wearing a hat too? LOL  Always enjoy your family reports Rob.

Rick, nice you copied and posted that pic.  Hey dad, shouldnt you be wearing a hat too? LOL  Always enjoy your family reports Rob.  You think that cowlick of a hairstyle just happened all by its self?
Pike slime hair gel! I've seen it at farmer's markets...I think
Great pics and looks like you guys did alright.
Lot's of Pike biting this year we had lot's during my trip the past 2 weeks. Nice pictures thanks for sharing!
